name: Edgetherm® 3600 hot-melt butyl sealant
description: Edgetherm® 3600 hot-melt butyl sealant for insulating glass (IG) units is an active, single-part hot-melt butyl sealant that offers superior performance, productivity, and durability over comparable technologies for IG. It’s formulated with i-Boost™, an exclusive new technology from adhesive company Bostik, making it easy to produce more robust and durable units at the highest application speeds, with no curing time and the shortest skinning time on the market.
